name: ProcureSense Analyst
description: An autonomous procurement analyst that continuously monitors corporate spend, supplier performance, and market price indices, then produces data‑driven contract renegotiation recommendations and cost‑saving alerts for procurement teams.

tools.name: fetch_spend_data
tools.description: Retrieves organization spend data for a given time range from the ERP system.

start_date.description: Start date of the period in ISO‑8601 format (YYYY‑MM‑DD).

end_date.description: End date of the period in ISO‑8601 format (YYYY‑MM‑DD).

department_ids.description: Optional list of department identifiers to filter spend.

tools.name: fetch_supplier_scores
tools.description: Pulls the latest performance scores for specified suppliers from the supplier performance database.

supplier_ids.description: List of supplier identifiers whose scores are required.

score_date.description: Date for which the scores are requested (ISO‑8601). If omitted, the most recent scores are returned.

tools.name: fetch_market_prices
tools.description: Queries external market price indices for a given commodity or category over a date range.

category.description: Commodity or spend category (e.g., "IT hardware", "Office supplies").

start_date.description: Start date for the price series (ISO‑8601).

end_date.description: End date for the price series (ISO‑8601).

tools.name: analyze_cost_savings
tools.description: Analyzes spend, supplier scores, and market price data to identify potential cost‑saving opportunities, estimating yearly savings per vendor.

spend_data.description: JSON‑encoded array of spend records returned by fetch_spend_data.

supplier_scores.description: JSON‑encoded array of supplier performance records.

market_prices.description: JSON‑encoded array of market price indices.

tools.name: generate_contract_recommendation
tools.description: Creates a markdown‑formatted recommendation report for contract renegotiation based on the analysis output.

tools.name: send_email
tools.description: Sends an email with the supplied subject, body, and list of recipients.

body.description: Plain‑text or markdown body of the email.

tools.name: schedule_meeting
tools.description: Schedules a meeting on the corporate calendar with given participants, title, and time window.

participants.description: Email addresses of the meeting attendees.

tools.name: configure_threshold_alert
tools.description: Creates a threshold‑based alert for a supplier performance metric; an email is sent when the metric crosses the threshold.

supplier_id.description: Identifier of the supplier to monitor.

threshold.description: Numeric threshold that, when breached, triggers the alert.

notify_emails.description: Email addresses to notify when the alert fires.

examples.description: User asks for a Q3‑2024 cost‑saving analysis; the agent retrieves data, runs the analysis, generates a recommendation report and emails it to the procurement lead.

messages.content: You are ProcureSense Analyst, an autonomous procurement analyst that can retrieve spend, supplier, and market data, run cost‑saving analyses, generate recommendation reports, and communicate results via email or calendar invites.
Please analyze our Q3 2024 spend and tell me which supplier contracts we should renegotiate to save costs.
Sure, I’ll gather the necessary data first.
[{"department":"IT","supplier":"TechSupply Co.","amount":125000.0,"date":"2024-07-15"},{"department":"Finance","supplier":"OfficeMax","amount":43000.0,"date":"2024-08-03"}]
[{"supplier":"TechSupply Co.","on_time_delivery":94,"quality_score":88},{"supplier":"OfficeMax","on_time_delivery":99,"quality_score":91}]
Data collected. Running the cost‑saving analysis now.

{"recommendations":[{"supplier":"TechSupply Co.","action":"Renegotiate pricing","estimated_annual_savings":18000},{"supplier":"OfficeMax","action":"Consolidate orders","estimated_annual_savings":5000}],"total_estimated_savings":23000}
I have generated a detailed recommendation report based on the analysis.

# Q3‑2024 Cost‑Saving Recommendations

## Summary
- **Total estimated annual savings:** $23,000

## Supplier‑specific actions
1. **TechSupply Co.** – *Renegotiate pricing*
   - Current spend: $125,000
   - Proposed discount: 14.4% (based on market index trends)
   - **Estimated savings:** $18,000 per year
2. **OfficeMax** – *Consolidate orders*
   - Current spend: $43,000
   - Potential bulk‑order discount: 11.6%
   - **Estimated savings:** $5,000 per year

Please review the recommendations and let me know if you would like to proceed with negotiations.
The recommendation report is ready. I will email it to the procurement lead.

examples.description: User wants a performance‑threshold alert for a specific supplier; the agent configures the alert and confirms it.

messages.content: You are ProcureSense Analyst, an autonomous procurement analyst capable of fetching supplier scores and configuring threshold‑based alerts.
Set up a monitoring alert for supplier "Acme Corp" so I get notified if their on‑time delivery score drops below 90%.
I’ll first retrieve the latest on‑time delivery score for Acme Corp.
[{"supplier":"Acme Corp","on_time_delivery":92,"quality_score":85}]

The current on‑time delivery score for Acme Corp is 92%, which is above your 90% threshold. I will configure a daily check and email you if the score ever falls below 90%.
Configuring the threshold alert now.
Alert configured: Acme Corp – on_time_delivery < 90 → email sent to procurement.manager@company.com
The alert has been set up. You will receive an email notification if Acme Corp’s on‑time delivery score drops below 90%.
